name: Touch
description: Receive input from touchscreen devices, and access device orientation and motion.

conditions.name: On hold
conditions.description: Triggered when a touch held in the same place for a time.

conditions.name: On tap
conditions.description: Triggered when a touch is quickly released from its start location.

conditions.name: On double-tap
conditions.description: Triggered when two taps occur in quick succession.

conditions.name: On hold over object
conditions.description: Triggered when a hold gesture is made over an object.

params.name: Object
params.description: Choose the object to check.

conditions.name: On tap object
conditions.description: Triggered when a tap gesture is made on an object.

params.name: Object
params.description: Choose the object to check.

conditions.name: On double-tap object
conditions.description: Triggered when a double-tap gesture is made on an object.

params.name: Object
params.description: Choose the object to check.

conditions.name: Compare orientation
conditions.description: Compare the current orientation (or tilt) of the device.

params.name: Orientation
params.description: Choose the orientation to compare (alpha = compass direction, beta = front-to-back tilt, gamma = left-to-right tilt).

params.name: Comparison
params.description: How to compare the orientation.

params.name: Angle
params.description: The orientation to compare to, in degrees.

conditions.name: Compare acceleration
conditions.description: Compare the acceleration of the device along an axis.

params.name: Axis
params.description: Choose the axis to compare acceleration for, and whether the measurement should include the force of gravity.

params.name: Comparison
params.description: How to compare the acceleration.

params.name: Acceleration
params.description: The acceleration to compare to, in m/s^2.

conditions.name: On any touch start
conditions.description: Triggered when any touch input begins.

conditions.name: On any touch end
conditions.description: Triggered when any touch input ends.

conditions.name: Is in touch
conditions.description: True if any touch is currently in contact with the device.

conditions.name: On touched object
conditions.description: Triggered when an object is touched.

params.name: Object
params.description: Choose the object to check for touch.

params.name: Type
params.description: Whether to trigger when starting or ending a touch on the object.

conditions.name: Is touching object
conditions.description: Test if in a touch and the touch point is over an object.

params.name: Object
params.description: Choose the object to check for being touched.

conditions.name: Compare touch speed
conditions.description: Compare the speed of a touch, e.g. to detect a swipe.

params.name: Touch index
params.description: The zero-based index of the touch to test the speed for.  0 is the first touch.

params.name: Comparison
params.description: How to compare the touch speed.

params.name: Speed
params.description: Speed to compare to, in absolute pixels per second.

conditions.name: On Nth touch start
conditions.description: Triggered when a particular touch input begins.

params.name: Touch number
params.description: Enter a zero-based index of the touch to test, e.g. 0 for first touch, 1 for second, etc.

conditions.name: On Nth touch end
conditions.description: Triggered when a particular touch input ends.

params.name: Touch number
params.description: Enter a zero-based index of the touch to test, e.g. 0 for first touch, 1 for second, etc.

conditions.name: Has Nth touch
conditions.description: True if a particular touch is currently in contact with the device.

params.name: Touch number
params.description: Enter a zero-based index of the touch to test, e.g. 0 for first touch, 1 for second, etc.

conditions.name: On permission granted
conditions.description: Triggered after the 'Request permission' action if the permission was granted.

params.name: Type
params.description: The type of permission.

conditions.name: On permission denied
conditions.description: Triggered after the 'Request permission' action if the permission was denied.

params.name: Type
params.description: The type of permission.

actions.name: Request permission
actions.description: Request permission to use device orientation or motion.

params.name: Type
params.description: The type of permission.

expressions.name: Alpha
expressions.description: The device compass direction relative to the device initial angle, in degrees.

expressions.name: Beta
expressions.description: The device front-to-back tilt, in degrees (front is positive).

expressions.name: Gamma
expressions.description: The device left-to-right tilt, in degrees (right is positive).

expressions.name: AccelerationXWithG
expressions.description: The device X acceleration with gravity, in m/s^2.

expressions.name: AccelerationYWithG
expressions.description: The device Y acceleration with gravity, in m/s^2.

expressions.name: AccelerationZWithG
expressions.description: The device Z acceleration with gravity, in m/s^2.

expressions.name: AccelerationX
expressions.description: The device X acceleration without gravity (if supported), in m/s^2.

expressions.name: AccelerationY
expressions.description: The device Y acceleration without gravity (if supported), in m/s^2.

expressions.name: AccelerationZ
expressions.description: The device Z acceleration without gravity (if supported), in m/s^2.

expressions.name: X
expressions.description: Get the primary touch X co-ordinate in the layout.

expressions.name: Y
expressions.description: Get the primary touch Y co-ordinate in the layout.

expressions.name: AbsoluteX
expressions.description: Get the primary touch X co-ordinate on the canvas.

expressions.name: AbsoluteY
expressions.description: Get the primary touch Y co-ordinate on the canvas.

expressions.name: TouchCount
expressions.description: Get the number of current touches.

expressions.name: XAt
expressions.description: Get a touch X co-ordinate in the layout from a zero-based index of the touch.

params.name: Index
params.description: Zero-based index of the touch to get.

expressions.name: YAt
expressions.description: Get a touch Y co-ordinate in the layout from a zero-based index of the touch.

params.name: Index
params.description: Zero-based index of the touch to get.

expressions.name: AbsoluteXAt
expressions.description: Get a touch X co-ordinate on the canvas from a zero-based index of the touch.

params.name: Index
params.description: Zero-based index of the touch to get.

expressions.name: AbsoluteYAt
expressions.description: Get a touch Y co-ordinate on the canvas from a zero-based index of the touch.

params.name: Index
params.description: Zero-based index of the touch to get.

expressions.name: SpeedAt
expressions.description: Get the speed of a touch, in absolute (screen) pixels per second.

params.name: Index
params.description: Zero-based index of the touch to get.

expressions.name: AngleAt
expressions.description: Get the angle of motion of a touch, in degrees.

params.name: Index
params.description: Zero-based index of the touch to get.

expressions.name: TouchIndex
expressions.description: Get the index of the current touch.

expressions.name: TouchID
expressions.description: Get the unique ID of the current touch.

expressions.name: XForID
expressions.description: Get a touch X co-ordinate in the layout for a touch with a specific ID.

params.name: ID
params.description: ID of the touch to get.

expressions.name: YForID
expressions.description: Get a touch Y co-ordinate in the layout for a touch with a specific ID.

params.name: ID
params.description: ID of the touch to get.

expressions.name: AbsoluteXForID
expressions.description: Get a touch X co-ordinate on the canvas for a touch with a specific ID.

params.name: ID
params.description: ID of the touch to get.

expressions.name: AbsoluteYForID
expressions.description: Get a touch Y co-ordinate on the canvas for a touch with a specific ID.

params.name: ID
params.description: ID of the touch to get.

expressions.name: SpeedForID
expressions.description: Get the speed of a touch with a specific ID, in absolute (screen) pixels per second.

params.name: ID
params.description: ID of the touch to get.

expressions.name: AngleForID
expressions.description: Get the angle of motion of a touch with a specific ID, in degrees.

params.name: ID
params.description: ID of the touch to get.

expressions.name: WidthForID
expressions.description: Get the width of a touch with a specific ID.

params.name: ID
params.description: ID of the touch to get.

expressions.name: HeightForID
expressions.description: Get the height of a touch with a specific ID.

params.name: ID
params.description: ID of the touch to get.

expressions.name: PressureForID
expressions.description: Get the pressure (from 0 to 1) of a touch with a specific ID.

params.name: ID
params.description: ID of the touch to get.

expressions.name: CompassHeading
expressions.description: The device compass direction relative to due north, in degrees.
